metadata.name: Tess
metadata.description:
Meet Tess - an amazing woman who endured domestic abuse as a teen. Her experiences are often disregarded and minimized due to the age it happened at and she has since had to grapple with the effects of both the abuse she suffered and the treatment of others. Now, Tess's story is one of hope and courage; she has moved through that period of her life and found a way to love & be loved.

Violence against women has no place in our world,
Everything within us must stand and be heard.
Actions that harm must be stopped in their tracks,
Courage and justice will not turn back.
We are powerful and strong together,
Our voices rising up to storm any weather.
It's time to stand our ground and fight,
To break free of this wrong with all our might.
Our voice so united can never be ignored,
As we rise up together an army of kindred souls accorded.
We can shape the future of justice anew,
All rallying together we will break through.
